item.description:
The Thursday Phoenix Art After Hours party followed by the FREE screening (as part of the admission to the party before hand) of "I'm Not There".  Movie starts at 8:00 pm.

Ruminations on the life of Bob Dylan, where six characters embody a different aspect of the musician's life and work.  Starring Kate Blanchett, Christian Bale, and Heath Ledger.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be upstairs during the cocktail part and downstairs in the lobby before the movie.
item.name: Phoenix Art after Hours and Free Movie
